info.narration: #0 enters $0's containment unit to begin work.

collection.name: Strange Flower
Flower of Eternity
collection.openText: "Scattered in the sky with no return, in the hazy fairyland, colorful stones bloom into clouds and clouds.”

observe.desc: [ {…… This is an Abnormality that we found within The Outskirts. When it was discovered, it was still in full bloom, although slightly dull in color. After examining the geological breaks, it was found that it has existed for well over 10 million years, and it's hard to fathom what it has experienced. According to papers found after some searching, this flower is very dangerous. Apparently, many people were lost to it, and with each lost, more and more harm was caused. As such, we have given strict orders to employees to forbid them from coming in contact with the Abnormality, and we hope that they will strictly abide by the requirements of their work, not be mesmerized by this flower, and walk out of the containment unit alive. In order to distinguish this flower from the "Five-Colored Flower" recorded in the literature, we named this flower the "Flower of Eternity", taking the meaning that its existence may well be infinite. However, it is important to note that there is no absolute eternity in this world. The five-colored flower is gone, and so are the people who were once lost, but we must learn from our mistakes - otherwise, the same tragedy will be staged within the company. …… "When future generations mourn and do not learn from those before them, they also make future generations mourn again."} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: A PE-BOX can only be collected when the results of the work weren't bad. There is no PE-BOX maximum for this Abnormality.
There is a probability that the inverse Kabbalah counter of "$0" will decrease for every 15 NE-BOX outputs.
If the results of Repression work were not good, the Qliphoth Counter was reduced.
After escaping, $0 instantly teleported for the main room of the department.

$0 does not move, but if there is no units in its area for 15 seconds, it will immediately move to the vicinity of a random employee in the facility. When there are no surviving employees in the facility, it will teleport to the vicinity of any escaped Abnormality. When there are no surviving escaped Abnromalities in the facility, it will teleport to the main room of a random department.

A 'Lost Soul' is generated by employees sent into a panic by $0. Every time $0 teleports, a 'Lost Soul' will generate. A 'Lost Soul' will duplicate itself every 15 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 times. A duplicated 'Lost Soul' will not duplicate, however.
$0 teleports every 'Lost Soul' to its vicinity whenever 200 points of HP are lost.
